subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: After Alex Gordon’s two-out single in the ninth skipped by the Giants’ outfielders, anything seemed possible. But the Royals’ third-base coach did not let such a big moment cloud his judgment.
snippet: After Alex Gordon’s two-out single in the ninth skipped by the Giants’ outfielders, anything seemed possible. But the Royals’ third-base coach did not let such a big moment cloud his judgment.
